name: [ENG] Nasty spells on Paradisia Island
description:
Nasty Spells on Paradisia Island is a TTRPG where you play as a group of people unhappy with their current life.
The seemingly happy and perfect Paradisia Island they live in is a nauseous place for them. They KNOW they deserve more.
And recently they've discovered the Spell. This will help you escape. It have to...

Decide what you want, and try to achieve the ritual without raising the suspicion of the cute animal-like townfolks !
Beware the Island Mayor whose role is to play the seemingly perfect world around you and maybe you will be able to escape !

This game was made for the the itch.io #CosmicHorrorJam, and is intended to be played as a one-shot.
It was made with a mix of Lovecraftian horror mixed with the cute island of Animal Crossing, and is heavily inspired by the TTRPG Soth, the Powered by the Apocalypse systems, 10 Candles and Fiasco, which are all awesome games you should check out !
